mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADDRESS_TYPE1_TARGET ( ZIPCODE, SIDO, GUGUN, DONG, BUNJI, SEQ, ESB_UID, ESB_TX_ID, ESB_STATE_CD, ESB_TIME ) values ( #{ZIPCODE, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SIDO, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{GUGUN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DONG, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BUNJI, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SEQ, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ESB_UID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ESB_TX_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'S', TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3') )
